Menu Bottom.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the last menu item.
Menu Bottom.Name: Menu Bottom

Menu Down.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the next menu item.
Menu Down.Name: Menu Down

Menu Execute.Description: This action is used to execute the action which is specified in the current menu item.
Menu Execute.Name: Menu Execute

Menu First.Description: This action is used to move to the first available popup menu that is defined in the top toolbar.
Menu First.Name: Menu First

Menu Last.Description: This action is used to move to the last available popup menu that is defined in the top toolbar.
Menu Last.Name: Menu Last

Menu Left.Description: This action is used to move to the previous popup menu that is defined in the top toolbar.
Menu Left.Name: Menu Left

Menu Reject.Description: This action is used to exit from the current menu.
Menu Reject.Name: Menu Reject

Menu Right.Description: This action is used to move to the next popup menu that is defined in the top toolbar.
Menu Right.Name: Menu Right

Menu Section Down.Description: This action is used to move to the first menu item of the next section.
Menu Section Down.Name: Menu Section Down

Menu Section Up.Description: This action is used to move to the first menu item of the previous section.
Menu Section Up.Name: Menu Section Up

Menu Top.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the first menu item ie the top most meu item.
Menu Top.Name: Menu Top

Menu Up.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the previous menu item.
Menu Up.Name: Menu Up
